entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
